General.Name: ObsEva SA
General.Description: ObsEva SA, a biopharmaceutical company, focuses on the development of novel therapies to improve women's reproductive health. It develops Nolasiban, an oral oxytocin receptor agonist for improving clinical pregnancy and live birth rates in women undergoing in-vitro fertilization. ObsEva SA was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Geneva, Switzerland.

1.Name: Dr. Ernest  Loumaye M.D., OB/GYN, Ph.D.
1.Title: Co-Founder & Director
